title: Report: The candidate with whom the whistleblower had a ‘professional’ tie is Joe Biden
text:
We learned earlier this week that the whistleblower had a working relationship with one of the current 2020 Democratic presidential candidates, at least according to the IC Inspector General. That wasn’t shocking at all, and now we’re even less surprised to read a report from the Washington Examiner that that candidate is none other than Joe Biden.

The 2020 Democratic candidate with whom the CIA whistleblower had a "professional" tie is @JoeBiden, according to intelligence officers and former @WhiteHouse officials. https://t.co/kELmnhhiL2 — Washington Examiner (@dcexaminer) October 10, 2019

Rob Crilly, Steven Nelson, and David M. Drucker report:

The 2020 Democratic candidate with whom the CIA whistleblower had a “professional” tie is Joe Biden, according to intelligence officers and former White House officials. Lawyers for the whistleblower said he had worked only “in the executive branch.” The Washington Examiner has established that he is a career CIA analyst who was detailed to the National Security Council at the White House and has since left. On Sept. 26, the New York Times reported that he was a CIA officer. On Oct. 4, the newspaper added that he “was detailed to the National Security Council at one point.” … A retired CIA officer told the Washington Examiner, “From everything we know about the whistleblower and his work in the executive branch then, there is absolutely no doubt he would have been working with Biden when he was vice president.”

No way. Could this be why the whistleblower’s source was “visibly shaken” after hearing the call?

🚨 BREAKING 🚨 Joe Biden worked with Whistleblower when he was Vice President Is anyone really surprised?

https://t.co/sI0tj8VMSn — Benny (@bennyjohnson) October 10, 2019

I knew it had to be Biden connected. No other candidate would want to help Joe out of his predicament. — Democrats are evil 👿 (@drdrjojo) October 10, 2019

pic.twitter.com/UAyenGm7xC — Hispanic Man With Gravy Stains On His Lapel (@HispanicGravy) October 10, 2019

Anyone who takes this whistleblower serious is sadly mistaken — Charlie (@SaintCharlie) October 10, 2019

This just keeps getting better — mike gauthier (@foehmr) October 10, 2019

No wonder they don’t want that out. — Darin Morris (@DarinMorris5) October 10, 2019

Why am I not the least bit surprised yet again? — Koley O'Neill (@KoleyONeill) October 10, 2019

What a shock — Frank (@fjdn40) October 10, 2019

Is anyone surprised? — Software Goddess (@GoddessSoftware) October 10, 2019

Uh-oh, Joe. You've got some explaining to do. — mrvegas (@mrvegas95214342) October 10, 2019

Related:
description: So the whistleblower worked with Joe Biden while he was vice president? No way.
